description: An authentic pilot's watch with a heritage feel, this TAG Heuer Autavia is a reinvented classic. Ready for adventure, the heroic blue sunray brushed dial, with highly luminescent Super-Luminova® hands and indexes offers maximum legibility.
name: TAG Heuer Autavia GMT COSC

description: Embrace the ocean depths with this TAG Heuer Aquaracer Professional 300 securely strapped around your wrist. This 42 mm timepiece, powered by the COSC-certified manufactured Calibre TH31-00, is your ultimate companion for underwater exploration.
name: TAG Heuer Aquaracer Professional 300 Date

description: Reimagined from the reverse panda 2447 NS model, this prestigious black 39mm version of the TAG Heuer glass box encapsulates the Carrera's signature design with a modern twist. With its luxurious perforated calfskin leather strap, this watch is resolutely driven to dare.
name: TAG Heuer Carrera Chronograph

description: A rugged sports alarm watch endowed with the timing technology and expertise TAG Heuer has accumulated over decades of intense Formula 1 involvement. Built of solid stainless-steel and water resistant to 200 meters, it is the perfect introduction to a motor-racing legend.
name: TAG Heuer Formula 1 Date

description: Experience the ultimate blend of technology and the Oracle Red Bull Racing universe with the TAG Heuer Connected Calibre E4 45mm x Oracle Red Bull Racing Edition****. This special edition watch features a black DLC-coated titanium case, exclusive watch faces, and a custom app that immerses you in the thrilling world of Oracle Red Bull Racing.
name: TAG Heuer Connected Calibre E4 x Oracle Red Bull Racing Edition

description: Seiko 5 Sports SRPD79 is a reliable and affordable automatic watch that offers a combination of style, functionality, and durability. It is a popular choice for those who appreciate a classic and versatile timepiece.
name: Seiko 5Sports SRPD79

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: The Seiko Prospex SPB381 is a limited-edition automatic dive watch inspired by the Seiko 6159-7001, a legendary diver's watch from the 1960s. It offers a combination of vintage aesthetics, modern features, and exceptional durability.
name: Prospex SPB381
tag: SEIKO PROSPEX 1968 diver's Modern Re-interpretation GMT

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: The unique dial of this watch was created through a form of traditional Japanese craftsmanship: Urushi lacquering, where layer upon layer of lacquer is applied by hand to give the dial its depth. Urushi is a natural lacquer obtained from the sap of the Japanese lacquer tree. The lacquer is painted onto the dials by master craftspeople and polished by hand several times, in order to obtain this deep, silky colour often found in art and design objects.
name: Seiko Urushi Lacquer SPB407J1

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: Astron's reputation as the world's first GPS solar watch soars to a whole new level with the 5X series. Cutting-edge features such as high-speed time zone adjustment, time transfer and more - in a definitively slim design. The series includes this GPS solar dual-time watch. It is complete with a black dial, a power-saving function, LumiBrite hands and indices, and more.
name: Astron GPS Solar Dual-time
features: Dual-curved sapphire glass with super-clear coating

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: Bold in design and cutting-edge in functionality, this watch from Coutura underscores class in every sense. Powered by the perpetual solar movement, this watch is complete with a black dial, LumiBrite hands and indices, a display that shows the month, date and day and more.
name: Coutura Perpetual Solar

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: Discover the innovative form and structural beauty of MT-G timepieces that combine metal materials with the resin used in the first G-SHOCK models. A vision of the galaxy, the MTG-B3000DN design is inspired by the beauty of nebulae shining through the vastness of space. This diffuse radiance is captured in the exquisite gradated blue and purple of the ion-plated stainless-steel bezel and complementary multi-colored dial components. The band is made of soft black urethane mixed with aluminum material in four different colors. Stainless-steel components, finished in blue and purple ion plating, represent stars shining through these nebulous clouds.
name: Casio MTG-B3000DN-1A

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: Celebrate 50 years of Casio watches with a beautifully updated Casiotron that symbolizes Casio’s determination to stay to who we are, while constantly innovating. This special limited-edition re-creation features a special commemorative color scheme and design with Casio colors, materials, and finishes that evoke the omnipresent yet ever-changing nature of the sky, the sea, and the sunlight — shining today and forevermore.
name: CASIOTRON TRN-50SS-2A

description: The Speedmaster Moonwatch is one of the world’s most iconic timepieces. Having been a part of all six moon landings, the legendary chronograph is an impressive representation of the brand’s adventurous pioneering spirit.

description: We set out to create a timepiece that embodies both the function and thrilling energy of racing. With a Japanese center second chronograph movement, high-performance tachymeter bezel and lume hour markers, the Sport Tourer is made for whatever road you take next. Fossil leather products support responsible manufacturing via the Leather Working Group.
name: Sport Tourer Chronograph

description: This pared-down, original 18K white gold watch, with its retrograde date display combined with precise moon phase, makes it very easy to tell the time. Depicting two polished gold moons and a star-studded sky, this poetic complication only needs adjusting every 122 years. Inspired by the designs of the 1950s, the hour markers and hands follow the gentle curve of the dial. The new fresh olive green color strap gives the watch a resolutely contemporary twist.
name: Moon Phase Retrograde Date

movement.value: Stop seconds device, Minutes, Precision moon phase, Hours

description: This 18K pink gold watch houses within its bold tonneau-shaped case the most poetic of complications: the precision moon phase. Accurate over 122 years, it is finished off with the power reserve display in the extension of its crescent moon.
name: Malte Moon Phase

movement.value: Stop seconds device, Minutes, Precision moon phase, Hours

description: Elegant yet casual, this 18K 5N pink gold watch houses a column-wheel chronograph enhanced by a date aperture between 4 and 5 o'clock. Its openworked caseback reveals an oscillating weight in 22K 3N yellow gold featuring decoration inspired by the wind rose, a tribute to the spirit of travel. Thanks to its pin buckle and three straps - 18K 5N pink gold, leather, and rubber - equipped with a self-interchangeable system, the watch can be personalized according to the owner's wishes. Through its links, the bracelet subtly reveals the Maltese cross, a Vacheron Constantin icon.
name: Overseas chronograph

movement.value: Stop seconds device, Minutes, Precision moon phase, Hours

description: This 18K 5N rose gold watch combines both precision and sophistication in its design. The railroad-style minute-counter, an iconic feature of the Traditionnelle Collection, adorns the edge of the dial and small seconds. The manually-wound movement offers a power reserve of nearly 3 days and features exceptional finishes visible through the openworked caseback.
name: Traditionnelle Manual-Winding

movement.value: Stop seconds device, Minutes, Precision moon phase, Hours

description: This watch in steel pays tribute to the legendary and assertive “cow horns” that adorned the 1955 manual-winding chronograph, reference 6087, the first water-resistant chronograph manufactured by Vacheron Constantin. Painted on the dial, the tachymeter scale makes it possible to determine an average speed thanks to the central hand of the chronograph. Rare and authentic, its calfskin-leather strap was developed by Serapian, a Maison from Milan dear to Vacheron Constantin.
name: Cornes de vache 1955

movement.value: Stop seconds device, Minutes, Precision moon phase, Hours

description: The Richard Mille RM032 is a highly sought-after and innovative timepiece known for its unique design, high-tech materials, and exceptional craftsmanship. It is part of the RM030 series, which was introduced in 2008 and has since become a symbol of contemporary watchmaking.
name: Richard Mille RM 032

description: The PRO TREK PRW-61SS features a special commemorative color scheme and design with Casio colors, materials, and finishes that evoke the omnipresent yet ever-changing nature of the sky, the sea, and the sunlight — shining today and forevermore.
name: Pro-Trek PRW-61SS-2
tag: Color and Design Evoking the Sky, Sea, and Sunlight

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: The Richard Mille RM037 is a highly sought-after and innovative timepiece known for its unique design, high-tech materials, and exceptional craftsmanship. It is part of the RM030 series, which was introduced in 2008 and has since become a symbol of contemporary watchmaking.
name: RM 037 Automatic Winding
tag: The Future of Horology: Richard Mille RM037

description: Sporting mechanisms that are as elegant as they are immediately recognisable. An identical obsession with excellence, precision, reliability and innovation. In 2021, Ferrari and Richard Mille, driven by their shared quest for perfection, joined forces to create a long-term partnership. Richard Mille celebrates this budding relationship with the creation of an exceptional ultra-flat timepiece, the RM UP-01 Ferrari.
name: RM UP-01 FERRARI

description: Live your passion. Be daring, throw yourself into it, and go beyond your limits. Then cross the finish line after an unrivalled technical and sporting performance! These are just a few of the characteristics that the watch brand and the legendary biennial Le Mans Classic have had in common since they first joined forces in 2002. Richard Mille's involvement in the automotive world is well-established. With a strong commitment to racing circuits, supporting teams and drivers, and particularly women in the sport, it was only natural for the brand to be involved with the Le Mans Classic at every level from the very beginning. Watches have been specially designed for every edition since 2008, each one in the event's colours. And this edition is no exception.
name: RM 72-01

description: Make a shimmering soft statement with a new addition to your color palette. This streamlined timepiece, with the classic look of hour, minute and second hands, catches an added touch of brilliance from the gleaming mirror finish of the band and bezel.
name: Sheen SHE-4541G-9A

movement.value: Day/Date display, Stop seconds hand function

description: Tradition and modernity. In its pink gold version, the Master Ultra Thin Small Seconds watch is housed in a fine-gauge (8.1 mm) 39-mm case, designed to accommodate its ultra-flat movement, the Jaeger-LeCoultre Caliber 896. This mechanical self-winding movement marks the hours, minutes and seconds with exemplary precision. A precision that the craftsmen of Jaeger-LeCoultre wished to pursue, even down to the delicate lines of this timepiece’s hour-markers and the finish of its dial, which bears an eggshell tint.
name: Master Ultra Thin Small Seconds
tag: A watch that tells your story.

description: Dressed with a mother-of-pearl dial, the Rendez-Vous Night & Day timepiece in steel accompanies its wearer with precious sophistication, day and night.
name: Rendez-Vous Classic Night & Day
tag: combination of style, elegance, and functionality

description: Equipped with the new generation Jaeger-LeCoultre Calibre 899, the Polaris Date watch is dressed in black and steel. Visible beneath the sapphire crystal case-back, this reference movement - entirely designed, decorated and assembled at the Manufacture - offers almost three days of power reserve (70 hours). With its contemporary design and vintage touch, this new Polaris Date recalls the signature codes of the 1968 Memovox Polaris. The triangle on the inner bezel, the indexes, the hour numerals and the hands are coated with a vanilla tint. In its 42 mm steel case, the dial has three levels of finishing that bring depth and contrast to the model: an internal bezel with an opaline finish, a grained circle for the hours and luminescent indexes, as well as a sunray-brushed center. Enhancing the adventurous spirit of the collection, the rubber strap with the “Clous de Paris” pattern can be easily changed in a single movement.
name: Polaris Date

description: Tradition GMT watch in 18-carat gold. Anthracite hand-wound movement. Second time-zone indicator. Day/night indicator. Off-centred local time subdial in silvered gold, hand-engraved on a rose engine. Black off-centred reference time subdial in gold, hand-engraved on a rose engine. Power reserve indicator on the back of the movement. Silicon Breguet balance-spring. Sapphire crystal caseback. Water-resistant to 3 bar (30 m). Diameter: 40 mm.
name: Tradition 7067BB/G1/9W6

description: Classique wristwatch in 18-carat rose gold. Self-winding movement. Balance-spring and lever in silicon. Red «grand feu» enamel dial with gold applied, engraved by hand, displaying the Chinese zodiac sign of the Dragon. Sapphire caseback. Water-resistant to 3 bar (30m). Diameter: 40mm.
name: Classique Dragon 7145

description: The Master Control Chronograph Calendar follows in the footsteps of the round watches so popular in the 1950s. Set in a case with a double brushed and polished finish, the two-tone dial offers incredible legibility for its functions (hours, minutes, small seconds), as well as its complications, notably the chronograph with its pulsometric scale and 30-minute counter. Visible under the sapphire crystal case-back, the in-house calibre 759 promises 65 hours of power reserve. Offered with an assortment of interchangeable straps - one in steel links, the other in blue leather - the Master Control Chronograph Calendar can change its look in an instant, while remaining resolutely in tune with the times.
name: Master Control Chrongraph Calendar

description: Marine High Jewellery wristwatch in 18-carat white gold set with 270 gems total weighing approx. 10 carats. Caseband, lugs and crown set with 63 baguette-cut diamonds and 1 briolette-cut diamond. Bezel set with 60 baguette-cut gems. Dial in mother-of-pearl set with 85 baguette-cut gems representing the Posidonia. Self-winding movement. Balance spring, lever and escape wheel in silicon. Sapphire caseback with oscillating weight decorated with Tahitian mother-of-pearl and set with 31 diamonds. Leather strap with iridescent effect and triple blade folding clasp in white gold set with 30 baguette-cut gems.
name: Haute Joailleire 9509 Poseidonia
tag: A Masterpiece of Jewelry and Horology

description: Reine de Naples wristwatch in 18-carat white gold. Bezel, dial flange and lug set with 161 diamonds, approx. 1,81ct. Crown set with a diamond, approx. 0,28ct. Self-winding movement. Balance spring, lever and escape wheel in silicon. Dial in blue mother-of-pearl with Breguet Arabic numerals. Variable length hand displaying the minute and disc revealing the hours in a window. Sapphire caseback. Water-resistant to 3 bar (30m). Dimensions: 36.5 x 28.45mm. Blue alligator strap with white gold triple blade folding clasp set with 28 diamonds, approx. 0,16ct.
name: Reine de Naples 9835

description: Type 20 flyback chronograph in steel. Self-winding movement with date and subdial for the seconds. Balance spring in silicon. 30-minute counter. Bidirectional rotating bezel. Luminescent hands and hour-markers. Sapphire caseback.
name: Type 20 chronographe 2057

description: A yellow circle, two oval eyes, a wide upturned mouth … The Smiley, drawn by Franklin Loufrani just over 50 years ago, has become an established symbol in the collective consciousness. It serves as the embodiment of positivity, joy and sharing and has played a major role at the heart of pop culture across several creative generations. This leading role was enough for the teams at Richard Mille to launch into the creation of an emotion-driven watch emphasising all these values.
name: Richard Mille RM 88

description: Exceptional complication reinvented. This is the promise of the new Reverso Tribute Chronograph, which features an hour-minute display on its two dials with contrasting and complementary styles. The front dial soberly displays the aesthetic codes of the Tribute line: gadroons, “railroad” minute track, applied hour-markers and Dauphine hands stand out against the sunray black dial. Once turned over on its cradle, the watch reveals a meticulously crafted open-worked reverse that unveils every detail of the new Manufacture Calibre 860 and the formidable mechanics of the retrograde chronograph: hour markers and minute track that seem to float above the movement, blue hands, bevelled bridges, Côtes de Genève… in leather or bi-material (leather/canvas), two interchangeable straps in Casa Fagliano design provide the watch with either a natural or a more sophisticated look.
name: Reverso Tribute Chronograph
